alert.note: Alert for Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 10:03PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern West Feliciana, north central West Baton Rouge, southeastern Pointe Coupee, western East Feliciana, northwestern East Baton Rouge Parishes in southeastern Louisiana and southeastern Wilkinson Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1003 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Erwinville, or near New Roads, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Roads, Jackson, St. Francisville, Livonia, Woodville, Wilson, Norwood, Wakefield, Spillman and Erwinville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
